user_query: I'm planning a surprise for my friend and I want to receive SMS messages from a specific number. Can you provide me with a list of available numbers to receive messages from? Additionally, I would like to get updates about newly received messages and retrieve the message details.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of available phone numbers for receiving SMS messages.
Set up a notification system to receive updates about newly received SMS messages.
TaskList.dependency: Step 1 needs to be completed to provide number_id.

TaskList.description: Implement a functionality to retrieve details of newly received messages.
TaskList.dependency: Step 2 needs to be completed to provide notification_id.
